subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ Moises Alou was scheduled, at last, to be activated for Tuesday night’s series opener against the Pittsburgh Pirates. But a new injury kept Alou on the disabled list.
snippet: The Mets’ Moises Alou was scheduled, at last, to be activated for Tuesday night’s series opener against the Pittsburgh Pirates. But a new injury kept Alou on the disabled list.
